Text:
Thank you very much. Very kind to share this.

jimcp @ http://mathematics-diary.blogspot.com

Most appreciated. Math was my 2nd major (after Chem), many years ago. Ended up in finance & taxes. It was OK but not as exciting as math can be. Am now working on a project where math is essential. This is a good starting point & will go on to diff & integ calc.  Thank you.
This is a seriously slow download.

Guys, thanks for seeding, if you are. The faster you seed, the quicker your own download would be. If you think by having zero upload speeds, your downloads will be quicker, that's plain error. So, please seed, and please also have good upload speeds. Thanks.
Could anybody please upload the compressed version of this tutorial for guys having slow internet connections like me.....pleaseeeeeeee
day by day the leechers are increasing in number, I am afraid I won't be able to dowload it if I keep waiting for a compressed version.

I strongly recommend people not share this. I got a DMCA letter from them. They will enforce protection of their copyrights. Their stuff is high quality but I chose to delete it all after I got the letter.

You know what, "IGotDMCA", just for your dumb remarks about receiving a letter from DMCA, I have made it a point to spread this to as many people as possible, together with all the other releases where you state the exact same dumb remark. Getting a letter from DMCA, eh? I guess, you should have refrained from giving them your address in the first place!
Btw, dohduhdah... I trust it IS your real name... and address?! :o) Thanks a million for your excellent uploads. You're top notch!
PLZ Sir Upload This one . Writing Creative Nonfiction by Professor Tilar J. Mazzeo, Colby College University of Washington, Ph.D
